title.rendered: Gore Canyon 2009: the ultimate Class V

content.rendered:
The biggest, baddest commercial whitewater trip in Colorado (and arguably in the entire U.S.) is almost here! AVA is running Gore Canyon for 5 weeks this year, from August 7 to September 7 on Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays and Mondays. Read more about Gore Canyon and watch video of the trip HERE.

You can also get a great deal on your trip this year. Go to our TRIP DISCOUNTS page for more info!

Gore Canyon offers an intense one-day run through some of the toughest whitewater you can run in a raft. Meet at our Kremmling office, which is just 2 hours from Denver.
